category.title: Get Started
category.description:
Welcome to the SDF tutorials! This is a great place to start, especially if you're a new SDF user. Each category to the left presents a collection of relevant tutorials.
Use the *Edit* button in the upper right corner of a tutorial page to go directly to its source at [bitbucket.org/osrf/sdf_tutorials](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdf_tutorials).
